name: DDoSAttack
description: Case template for managing distributed denial-of-service incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a DDoS attack.

tasks.title: Identify attack vector
tasks.description: Determine the type and origin of the DDoS attack, including potential botnets or malicious services involved.

tasks.title: Mitigate the attack
tasks.description: Apply mitigation strategies such as traffic filtering, rate limiting, and coordination with the ISP.

tasks.title: Monitor the network
tasks.description: Monitor network traffic to confirm the attack is mitigated and to detect possible retries.

tasks.title: Perform network forensic analysis
tasks.description: Analyze logs and captures to understand the attackers' methodology and tooling.

tasks.title: Update defensive mechanisms
tasks.description: Strengthen protections and update procedures to prevent similar attacks.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Record findings and recommendations to improve readiness for future DDoS attacks.

notes.title: Attack vector
notes.content: Details about the DDoS vector that was identified.

notes.title: Attack origin
notes.content: Information about the source of the attack and possible actors.

notes.title: Mitigation strategies
notes.content: Summary of the actions taken to mitigate the attack.

notes.title: Forensic analysis
notes.content: Results from the forensic analysis of logs and network traffic.

notes.title: Lessons learned
notes.content: Summary of improvements and recommendations after the incident.
